content: **introducing the year of bulky hats ** we continue to be overwhelmed at the positive reception to our year of hats from 2019 and it was a no brainer to do it again in germantown bulky fernhill is the february hat 1 you know and love but somehow even squishier the textured stitches look great in germantown bulky and the patterns worked from a chart are repetitive and easy to memorize **worthy of note** this hat begins with a provisional cast on then a brim is worked in a k1 p1 ribbing after the brim is complete the body and crown of the hat are worked in a texture stripe pattern from charts a pom pom and custom leather tag complete the look the body chart is worked 8 times around and the crown chart is worked 4 times around **specifications yarn** kelbourne woolens germantown bulky 100% n american wool 123 yds/100 gm skein natural 105 1 skein **gauge** 13 sts + 20 rnds = 4 10 cm in body chart pattern on larger ndls after blocking **needles** 1 16 40 cm us 8 5 mm
